metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7544 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
libexif through 0.6.21 is vulnerable to out-of-bounds heap read vulnerability in exif_data_save_data_entry function in libexif/exif-data.c caused by improper length computation of the allocated data of an ExifMnote entry which can cause denial-of-service or possibly information disclosure.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7544` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libexif12 - 0.6.21-4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libexif package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-4').
